long_description: With stylish leather uppers and cushioned soles, the Merrell Realm Moc shoes slide on easy, and give you lasting comfort as your day at the office transitions into happy hour with friends. Full-grain leather uppers hold up to everyday wear and tear; dual gores for easy on. Smooth leather linings help feet slide into shoes, and offer all-day comfort and temperature regulation. Anatomic EVA footbeds offer cushioning for all-day wear; Air Cushion pods in the heels absorb shock throughout your stride. Molded nylon shanks support your arches, reducing foot fatigue; Merrell Realm Moc shoes feature sticky rubber outsoles with 2mm lugs for reliable traction.
short_description: With stylish leather uppers and cushioned soles, the Merrell Realm Moc shoes slide on easy, and give you lasting comfort as your day at the office transitions into happy hour with friends.
